Issue: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem
Sub-issue: Their investigation did not fix an error on your report

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative: XXXX XXXX and Experian are updating a closed and paid in full account every single month as Negative late and charge off when the account was settled and paid in full 4 months ago. The credit bureaus goes between those 3 descriptions and continue to report on this account every week, making my credit score drop when this account has been closed and paid off for months now. Instead of fixing the information after sending emails proving that Ive paid the account off, they have every excuse in the book as to why they are right and I am wrong. Ive reached out to XXXX XXXX twice and Experian and  XXXX   twice as well. I was told today to take it up with the Consumer Finance so this is what I am doing now. I really hope this can be  resolved and quickly as Ive done my part and need the credit bureaus and XXXX XXXX to do theirs!
